Home.title: Welcome to the Future
Home.description: Discover Virtual Solar. No installation. Cheap energy. Instant connection.

Description.title: What is Virtual Solar?
Description.description: Neos offers you the opportunity to buy solar panels located in Spain’s existing solar parks. This means that you will generate your own renewable electricity and receive it at your house or business through the country’s power grid, as soon as the first day of next month!
Description.point1Description: Up to 80% reduction in electricity bills,and X% cheaper than rooftop solar installations.
Description.point2Description: Instant connection to the grid. No rooftop panel or any kind of installation required.
Description.point3Description: Payback period of around 6.9 years, compared to 14 years for rooftop panels.
Description.point4Description: Solar panels have a 25-year useful life, providing 100% renewable energy.

Get-offer.You will not need anything else to get t: You will not need anything else to get the offer
Get-offer.You will need your latest electricity bi: You will need your latest electricity bill to get the offer
Get-offer.review-expert-txt: Review your proposal with your Solar Expert

Get-offer-form.field-label1: Number of people living in house
Get-offer-form.field-desc: You can find your CUPS number in any of your electricity bills
Get-offer-form.form-t&c: By ticking, you are confirming that you have read, understood and agree

How-it-work.title: How it works?
How-it-work.point1: Neos becomes your retailer and uses the grid system to transport the electricity generated by your solar panels into your home.
How-it-work.point2: During solar production hours, you will pay €0.00 for the energy you consume.
How-it-work.point3: If there’s excess production, Neos will sell 100% of the excess to the electricity market.
How-it-work.point4: Outside of solar production hours you will pay the market price of electricity, with a margin of €0.01 per KWh.
How-it-work.point5: You will need to pay tolls and costs associated with using the grid, estimated at €0.02 per KWh.
How-it-work.point6: If you decide you do not want Neos as your retailer, there’s no commitment to stay with us, and you can choose another retailer at any point.
How-it-work.point7: If you choose another retailer, we will send you every month the revenues generated by selling your solar energy into the electricity market, which is equivalent to the savings you would obtain if you were still with Neos.

Compare-our-offer.point2: more energy production per panel compared to rooftop solar panels
